title: By the King, a proclamation commanding the immediate return of all His Majesties subjects who are in any foreign seminaries, and forbidding relief to be sent to them
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the eighth day of January 1678.  In the thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
